message.content:
A ping-pong ball is a lightweight ball used in the sport of table tennis.
It has a round shape and is approximately 40mm in diameter.
The ball is typically made of celluloid or similar materials.
It has a smooth and glossy finish and is often white or orange in color.
The ball has a high bounce and excellent aerodynamics, allowing for precise shots during gameplay.
Ping-pong balls are commonly used in recreational settings like community centers, schools, and homes.
Professional players may also use specialized balls with specific characteristics for competition.
